screen_desc: The screenshot shows a Google search results page for Costco, with options for reviews, photos, about, maps, and locations. There are links to Costco's website, sign-in, and warehouse locations. There is also an advertisement for Costco Wholesale in the bottom part of the screen.
action_think: First, I need to locate the Costco website in the search results and navigate to it.
action_plan: Click on the Costco website link
Click on the 'Cart' icon in the top navigation menu
action_desc: Click on the Costco website link located at the top left of the screen.
action_result: By clicking on the "Sign In" link, you are now able to access your Costco account and manage your shopping cart. This is an important step towards the user request because it allows you to view and remove any items you no longer want to keep in your cart. Additionally, it provides you with the option to add the LG Ultragear monitor to your cart at the desired location.
prev_action_result: The last action was pressing the enter key, which was a mistake as it submitted the query instead of proceeding to the search results. This caused the screen to refresh and display a new page with search results for "costco," which is not the desired page for the user request. To correct this, you should navigate back to the search results page by pressing the back button or returning to the home screen and opening the search bar again.
